data.actual_result: Mini box flashes your profile picture in the box right before disappearing
data.expected_result: Mini box disappears when you disconnect without showing your profile picture
data.short_description: Disconnecting from a server screenshare after sharing your screen flashes your profile picture in the mini box before disappearing
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel on a server with screenshare - Start sharing your screen - Disconnect from the voice channel, and observe the mini box for the screenshare - This does not happen in direct messages, only servers
